title: Kamala Harris' facial expressions take center stage in debate drama with Trump, netizens react to 'eye rolls and exaggerated smiles'
content: Vice President Kamala Harris faced intense scrutiny for her animated facial expressions during the ABC News Presidential Debate against former President Trump. Social media reactions were mixed, with critics calling her gestures rehearsed and questioning their authenticity. Some compared her expressions to those from the 2020 vice presidential debate against Mike Pence.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris faced intense scrutiny for her animated facial expressions during the ABC News Presidential Debate against former President Trump. Social media reactions were mixed, with critics calling her gestures rehearsed and questioning their authenticity. Some compared her expressions to those from the 2020 vice presidential debate against Mike Pence.

title: Anti-war protests turn violent at Australia's largest defence industry event
content: Anti-war protests in Melbourne escalated into violent clashes with police outside the Land Forces International Land Defence Exposition. Demonstrators chanted pro-Palestine slogans and waved flags while riot police used tear gas and rubber bullets to disperse them. The unrest led to several arrests and major road closures in the city.
summary: Anti-war protests in Melbourne escalated into violent clashes with police outside the Land Forces International Land Defence Exposition. Demonstrators chanted pro-Palestine slogans and waved flags while riot police used tear gas and rubber bullets to disperse them. The unrest led to several arrests and major road closures in the city.

title: South Carolina Congressman Joe Wilson collapses from stroke-like symptoms at DC event
content: South Carolina Congressman Joe Wilson collapsed at an event in Washington, D.C., showing stroke-like symptoms. He was taken to a local hospital and is now stable. His son, Attorney General Alan Wilson, confirmed his condition. Ukraine’s Ambassador to Washington commended the swift medical response and stressed the importance of CPR knowledge.
summary: South Carolina Congressman Joe Wilson collapsed at an event in Washington, D.C., showing stroke-like symptoms. He was taken to a local hospital and is now stable. His son, Attorney General Alan Wilson, confirmed his condition. Ukraine’s Ambassador to Washington commended the swift medical response and stressed the importance of CPR knowledge.

title: US presidential debate: Putin would 'eat' Trump 'for lunch,' says Kamala Harris
content: Kamala Harris criticized Donald Trump during a presidential debate, arguing that if he were president, Putin would have taken Kyiv. Trump stated his desire to end the Russia-Ukraine war without choosing sides. Harris emphasized her strong ties with Zelensky and the necessity of supporting international rules and alliances.
summary: Kamala Harris criticized Donald Trump during a presidential debate, arguing that if he were president, Putin would have taken Kyiv. Trump stated his desire to end the Russia-Ukraine war without choosing sides. Harris emphasized her strong ties with Zelensky and the necessity of supporting international rules and alliances.

title: At least 16 people killed in landslide in northern Vietnam
content: In northern Vietnam's Lao Cai province, a landslide caused by flash floods has led to at least 16 deaths and numerous missing persons. The incident buried 128 people, with only 30 rescued so far. Typhoon Yagi's heavy rain over the weekend complicated rescue operations in this remote mountainous area.
summary: In northern Vietnam's Lao Cai province, a landslide caused by flash floods has led to at least 16 deaths and numerous missing persons. The incident buried 128 people, with only 30 rescued so far. Typhoon Yagi's heavy rain over the weekend complicated rescue operations in this remote mountainous area.

title: Giant plumes of smoke dot Southern California skies as crews fight several major wildfires
content: Southern California firefighters are combating several major wildfires during an intense heat wave, threatening tens of thousands of homes. Significant fires have erupted in Orange County, San Bernardino National Forest, and Angeles National Forest. Efforts continue with hopes for better containment as cooler weather approaches later this week.
summary: Southern California firefighters are combating several major wildfires during an intense heat wave, threatening tens of thousands of homes. Significant fires have erupted in Orange County, San Bernardino National Forest, and Angeles National Forest. Efforts continue with hopes for better containment as cooler weather approaches later this week.

title: Trump denies connection to Project 2025 after Harris’s critique: What is Project 2025 and why is it controversial?”
content: Donald Trump distanced himself from Project 2025 after Kamala Harris associated him with it during a debate. The Heritage Foundation's document outlines potential policies for a hypothetical second Trump term. Although some contributors are former Trump administration members, he denies any connection and criticizes certain ideas as extreme.
summary: Donald Trump distanced himself from Project 2025 after Kamala Harris associated him with it during a debate. The Heritage Foundation's document outlines potential policies for a hypothetical second Trump term. Although some contributors are former Trump administration members, he denies any connection and criticizes certain ideas as extreme.

title: Taylor Swift endorses Kamala Harris for US president after Trump debate
content: Taylor Swift has publicly endorsed Kamala Harris for President in the 2024 election through an Instagram post. She praised Harris's advocacy for important rights and causes. Swift also addressed concerns over AI-generated misinformation and encouraged her followers to research candidates' positions on significant issues before casting their votes.
summary: Taylor Swift has publicly endorsed Kamala Harris for President in the 2024 election through an Instagram post. She praised Harris's advocacy for important rights and causes. Swift also addressed concerns over AI-generated misinformation and encouraged her followers to research candidates' positions on significant issues before casting their votes.

title: Italian minister's ex-lover banned from Parliament for spy glass filming
content: Maria Rosaria Boccia, former adviser to Italy's culture minister Gennaro Sangiuliano, was banned from parliament for using spy glasses to film inside the chamber. This incident led to Sangiuliano's resignation and prompted investigations into possible misuse of public funds and unauthorized disclosure of confidential information.
summary: Maria Rosaria Boccia, former adviser to Italy's culture minister Gennaro Sangiuliano, was banned from parliament for using spy glasses to film inside the chamber. This incident led to Sangiuliano's resignation and prompted investigations into possible misuse of public funds and unauthorized disclosure of confidential information.

title: Trump falsely accuses immigrants in Ohio of abducting and eating pets: 'They’re eating dogs. They’re eating cats'; Kamala calls claims ‘extreme’
content: Donald Trump sparked controversy by alleging that Haitian immigrants in Springfield, Ohio, are abducting and eating pets. Kamala Harris dismissed the claims as extreme during a debate. Local officials confirmed no credible reports support these allegations. The rumors originated from a social media post and have been widely debunked.
summary: Donald Trump sparked controversy by alleging that Haitian immigrants in Springfield, Ohio, are abducting and eating pets. Kamala Harris dismissed the claims as extreme during a debate. Local officials confirmed no credible reports support these allegations. The rumors originated from a social media post and have been widely debunked.

title: Kamala Harris says Trump ‘sold us out’ to China, hits out at Xi Jinping
content: Kamala Harris accused Donald Trump of failing to protect American interests against China, highlighting his sale of chips to China and praise for Xi Jinping during the pandemic. She emphasized that US policy should aim to win the 21st-century competition. Trump defended his tariffs on Chinese goods, which Harris argued were detrimental to American consumers.
summary: Kamala Harris accused Donald Trump of failing to protect American interests against China, highlighting his sale of chips to China and praise for Xi Jinping during the pandemic. She emphasized that US policy should aim to win the 21st-century competition. Trump defended his tariffs on Chinese goods, which Harris argued were detrimental to American consumers.

title: Trump uses Harris' own catchphrase against her in fiery debate exchange: 'I’m talking now — Does that sound familiar?'
content: During a high-stakes debate, Donald Trump criticized Kamala Harris for shifting positions on fracking and policing. Using Harris' own catchphrase from a previous debate, Trump highlighted her past stance. The exchange underscored the intense scrutiny and criticism between the two candidates as they compete for the presidency.
summary: During a high-stakes debate, Donald Trump criticized Kamala Harris for shifting positions on fracking and policing. Using Harris' own catchphrase from a previous debate, Trump highlighted her past stance. The exchange underscored the intense scrutiny and criticism between the two candidates as they compete for the presidency.

title: Kamala Harris, Donald Trump share 'awkward' handshake
content: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump shook hands during their first face-to-face meeting at Tuesday night's presidential debate. They debated key issues like immigration and abortion in an intense encounter without a live audience. This debate provided a critical opportunity to influence undecided voters ahead of the November election.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump shook hands during their first face-to-face meeting at Tuesday night's presidential debate. They debated key issues like immigration and abortion in an intense encounter without a live audience. This debate provided a critical opportunity to influence undecided voters ahead of the November election.

title: 'Trump should not be telling a woman what to do with her body': Kamala Harris
content: Kamala Harris criticized Donald Trump's stance on abortion rights during a debate, emphasizing her support for reinstating Roe v. Wade. She condemned Trump-backed abortion bans in over 20 states as draconian and immoral. Trump defended state-level regulation and emphasized his support for In vitro fertilisation (IVF). The debate underscores the high stakes of the upcoming election.
summary: Kamala Harris criticized Donald Trump's stance on abortion rights during a debate, emphasizing her support for reinstating Roe v. Wade. She condemned Trump-backed abortion bans in over 20 states as draconian and immoral. Trump defended state-level regulation and emphasized his support for In vitro fertilisation (IVF). The debate underscores the high stakes of the upcoming election.

title: US presidential debate: Kamala, Trump on policy, international affairs, high price and illegal immigrations -Key takeaways
content: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump faced off in their first debate. Harris highlighted her plans for an 'opportunity economy' and criticized Trump's policies. Trump responded by clarifying his tariff strategy, asserting that it would bring financial benefits to the US.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump faced off in their first debate. Harris highlighted her plans for an 'opportunity economy' and criticized Trump's policies. Trump responded by clarifying his tariff strategy, asserting that it would bring financial benefits to the US.

title: Georgia school shooting: Suspect's mom's call wasn't the only alert, multiple warnings overlooked before Apalachee high attack
content: The recent school shooting at Apalachee High School in Georgia has revealed multiple missed warnings leading up to the tragedy. An urgent call from the shooter's mother and an anonymous tip about planned attacks were not acted upon promptly. The incident resulted in four deaths and nine injuries, raising serious questions about school safety protocols.
summary: The recent school shooting at Apalachee High School in Georgia has revealed multiple missed warnings leading up to the tragedy. An urgent call from the shooter's mother and an anonymous tip about planned attacks were not acted upon promptly. The incident resulted in four deaths and nine injuries, raising serious questions about school safety protocols.

title: 'Abortion-rights measure will appear in ballot,' Missouri's Supreme Court rules
content: Missouri's Supreme Court has ruled that a proposed amendment to restore abortion rights will be included on the November ballot. This decision enables voters to decide on legal abortion for the first time since Roe v. Wade was overturned. The measure needs at least 50% voter support, with recent polls showing 52% in favor.
summary: Missouri's Supreme Court has ruled that a proposed amendment to restore abortion rights will be included on the November ballot. This decision enables voters to decide on legal abortion for the first time since Roe v. Wade was overturned. The measure needs at least 50% voter support, with recent polls showing 52% in favor.

title: 'America is going bankrupt extremely quickly,' Elon Musk warns as debt continues to accelerate
content: Elon Musk has warned that the United States is rapidly approaching bankruptcy with a national debt over $35 trillion. Speaking at the All-In Summit 2024, he highlighted the need for deregulation and smaller government. Musk pointed out that interest payments on this debt have now exceeded $1 trillion annually, stressing future generations will bear this burden.
summary: Elon Musk has warned that the United States is rapidly approaching bankruptcy with a national debt over $35 trillion. Speaking at the All-In Summit 2024, he highlighted the need for deregulation and smaller government. Musk pointed out that interest payments on this debt have now exceeded $1 trillion annually, stressing future generations will bear this burden.

title: Joe Biden sparks social media frenzy with 'Tomorrow I’m doing 9/11' comment, watch video
content: US President Joe Biden's comment about "doing 9/11" has caused a social media uproar. During a discussion, he mentioned he would be commemorating the September 11 attacks, which many found poorly phrased. He clarified that he would visit key memorials in New York and Pennsylvania to honor the victims of the terrorist attacks.
summary: US President Joe Biden's comment about "doing 9/11" has caused a social media uproar. During a discussion, he mentioned he would be commemorating the September 11 attacks, which many found poorly phrased. He clarified that he would visit key memorials in New York and Pennsylvania to honor the victims of the terrorist attacks.

title: Democrat Eric Swalwell slams viral Trump cat and duck memes: 'What in the hell is this?'
content: Rep. Eric Swalwell's reaction to viral memes featuring Donald Trump with cats and ducks has gone viral. The memes originated from a debunked conspiracy theory alleging Haitian immigrants were abducting pets in Ohio. Swalwell criticized Republican House Judiciary Chairman Jim Jordan for promoting these unfounded claims on social media.
summary: Rep. Eric Swalwell's reaction to viral memes featuring Donald Trump with cats and ducks has gone viral. The memes originated from a debunked conspiracy theory alleging Haitian immigrants were abducting pets in Ohio. Swalwell criticized Republican House Judiciary Chairman Jim Jordan for promoting these unfounded claims on social media.
